body_html:
Ok, give me a few minutes to finish working on the rintop pull request and
I'll change the name in this one.

On Wed, Mar 2, 2016, 1:28 PM Geoffrey Irving notifications@github.com
wrote:

diag_part is mathematically unambiguous and matches common usage ("the
diagonal part of A"). It's unfortunately that numpy is different, but
get_diag is just as bad there.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#1265 (comment)
.
